overview: Caleidoscope.in is a forum that intends to collect interesting experiences and unique information on niche subjects such as Offbeat Travel, Alternative Lifestyle, Volunteering, Design, Art & Culture, Food, Nostalgiphilia, etc. Just like a Kaleidoscope which fascinates you with new design every time you view it, we would like to offer a different and interesting take on everyday life and a first time view of undiscovered aspects of life as well.
